summary: This is a modders resource with new rocks to add to your own mod.
descriptionHtml:
Details
=======
There are 13 new rock models made by Ztree, all with working collision. The rock models are whole and have texture all around, so they can be turned in any direction.
The rocks are using textures from the Hoddminir ground texture pack, there are 13 different texture variant of each rock to choose from.

I have uploaded three different resolutions of this resource, 512, 1024 and 2048.

As always, if you make something with these rocks that you think looks really nice, please upload a picture, I love to see it :)
And don\'t forget to endorse if you like this resource.

Install
=======
Un-zip files
Copy textures dds files to the Skyrim/Data/Texture/landscape and Skyrim/Data/Texture/landscape/ztree´s rocks folders
Copy nif files to the Skyrim/Data/Meshes/ztree\'s/rocks folders

If you are already using the Hoddminir groundtexture pack these are the same texture files in Skyrim/Data/Texture/landscape.

How to use this resource
=========
The resource is as nif and texture files, you will have to add them to your mod manually.

With the Creation kit - How to add static objects
1. Open the CK, load your mod as active and Skyrim.esm. static objects are found in the Object window under WorldObjects/Static.
2. Double click on any original object, this will open the edit window.
3. In ID write a new uniq name
4. click the Art file Edit, choose the new rock nif file, found in the Skyrim/Data/Meshes/ztree\'s/rocks folder. Click OK.
5. Now the CK will ask you if you want to create a new object, press Yes.
6. When you reload the Object window it will have created a new folder \"ztree\'s\" and \"rocks\" where the rocks are located.
Don´t forgett to save.

If you have trouble adding the rocks, contact me and I can make a esp for you :)


Uninstall
=========
Delete files

History
=======

v1.0, 05/01/2013 - Initial release


Contact
=======
If something is not working, please contact me or Ztree.
You can find me on TESNexus and the official Elder Scrolls forums as \'Elinen\'


Credits
=======
Ztree for the Rock models.
Thanks to [url=http://www.darkcreations.org/]Dark Creations[/url] for hosting the Hoddminir project.
Bethesda for an excellent game.


Licensing/Legal
===============
You can this resource in your mod, I ask in return is that
you give me and Ztree if you distribute any part of this mod as part of your own work.
If you want to use the textures for something else or change them that is OK.
The new models in these files can not be used for any mods that are being sold, for money, on Steam Workshop or other platforms.
author: Ztree and Elinen
